Returning on October 20, Murray Lightburn and his mob of Montreal miserablists The Dears have announced the release of their fourth record, Missiles, follow-up to their acclaimed "Gang Of Losers". With "Missiles", this Montreal band have emerged as elder statesmen of the indie rock renaissance.
